condition.narrative: Finance Agreement :Establishment of the Urumqi Comprehensive Transport Information Center | Description :Project Agreement,Schedule, Section I A. 9. UMG to establish Urumqi Comprehensive Transport Information Center (UCTIC) no later than June 30, 2017,assign adequate staff and resources, and ensure that: (a) relevant agencies and departments share information with the center; and(b) the information center shares data with transport users and the private sector in a meaningful and timely manner. | Due Date:30-Jun-2017

Finance Agreement :Implementation Agreement among UCTRC, UMECD and UUTIC | Description :Project Agreement, Schedule, Section I A.6. UUTIC, UCTRC and UMECD shall enter into an Implementation Agreement by no later than January 31, 2016, under terms andconditions acceptable to the Bank. | Due Date :31-Jan-2016

Finance Agreement :Parking management strategy adopted by UMG |Description :Project Agreement, Schedule, Section I A. 8.UrumqiMunicipal Government (UMG) would finalize and adopt an improvedparking management strategy along the three project BRTcorridors nolater than June 30, 2018. | Due Date :30-Jun-2018
